title: What are the safety measures to look for before enrolling a girl child in a residential school? - Quora

response.answer_text: The first thing you can do is google news stories about the school. Have they had incidents in the past? How many? How long ago? Then, some time during the admissions process, ask them directly what they do to protect the children from predators. I think one of the best policies a school can have is to make sure that kids are rarely alone with an adult.
